scripts.build: bun run build:typescript && bun run build:rescript
scripts.build:typescript: bun run --cwd packages/core build && bun run --cwd packages/cli build
scripts.test:rescript: bun run --cwd packages/core build && bun run --cwd packages/cli build && rescript build && bun test packages/core/tests
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:typescript && bun run typecheck:rescript
scripts.typecheck:typescript: bun run --cwd packages/core check && bun run --cwd packages/cli check
